15.content:
Word of the infamous, yet rarely spoken of 'Foot club', was something akin to an urban legend around that part of town, especially considering how it involved teenage girls and their lust for everything below the ankle. Everyone knew about boys and their well documented affection for soles, toes and heels but girls? Many would think such a thing preposterous and highly unlikely. Alas, the club existed and it was its niche activities that lured in a new trio of girls, curiosity tempering their thoughts. It came as no surprise that such an exclusive little group of curious young women would attract attention, be it good or bad, but it nonetheless sparked the curiosity of three friends who'd heard hushed whispers of the odd little club.

Amelia was the girl that propositioned the trip to the club, having followed the lengthy paper trail of rumours, gossip, eye-witness accounts and horny boys to the front door of a very ostentatious property in one of the more affluent areas in the town. She was a petite gymnast with chestnut hair, a slanted grin that held her cheekiness at bay and brilliant blue eyes that would send the pacific ocean a run for its money. Garbed in a grey tank top, black skinny jeans and well worn ballet flats the teenager was the very model of the 'girl next door', one whose occasionally naughty nature often got her and her friends in trouble. Was walking into a forbidden foot club trouble? She was about to find out. Her feet, though hidden, were dainty and supple, barely passing a size six and were coated in a fine layer of gym dust that was sandwiched between the soles of her blushing feet and the modest flats.

Standing next to her was Nicole, a porcelain skinned girl who was often thought to be several years older than she actually was. A cheerleader of the highest caliber and with a sour attitude to match her well regarded flexibility, the tall and leggy blonde held the hearts of the poor boys who fell for her and crushed them beneath the soles of her size eleven feet on a daily basis. Controlling, narcissistic and overly snarky, Nicole was not only a fiery personality but a girl wholly comfortable in her kinky tastes and exhibitionist nature. Of the three visitors she was the most experienced, a fact she enjoyed reminding Amelia and anyone else who tried one-upping her. Adorning her slender feet were red suede heels, the pink tips of her brightly coloured toes peeking out from under the dark straps. With arches blessed with a particularly impressive curve, the sassy cheerleader knew exactly how to show off her feet.

Lastly, finishing off the odd trio of curious teenagers was Violet, a dark haired girl who'd only recently arrived from Paris after a year long stay there. Quiet, sweet yet exceptionally stylish, Violet was born to be a girl destined for success, her parents ensuring she knew how blessed she was. With an asian mother and a french father, Violet possessed near flawless skin, a slim build and lips that were almost always curled in an innocent pout, a sight that endeared to almost anyone who saw her. Although much more shy than her two friends, the girl kept the reckless Amelia and the Hot-headed Nicole from killing one another and often did so by worshiping both their feet at the same time...a secret little bonding exercise that actually worked the first time she tried it. If Amelia's feet were dainty and dirty and Nicole's were slender and flexible then Violet was a modest balance between the two, with delicately cared for size eight feet that were expertly pedicured with french tips. She wore simple black sandals to complete her demure appearance.

"You know, I really hope this is worth it." Nicole uttered ryly, rolling her eyes as she fixed a crease in the very short skirt she was wearing, throwing a passing glance down at their feet before giving herself a smug grin. "Now, let's be honest if this thing is real do you reckon they'd put me on a throne and beg me to put my toes in their mouths?" The girl smirked, nudging Amelia in the side before glancing at Violet who had yet to say much more than a 'hello' when they picked her up.

"Yeah yeah, keep telling yourself that barbie." Amelia retorted with a sniff, brushing a strand of hair from her brow before unceremoniously banging on the front door, an impassive look painted on her girlish features. "If they don't come andd answer in a minute I'll promise we'll get back to your house and Violet here will massage your precious widdle toes." The gymnast purred sarcastically, offering the quiet dark haired beauty a cheeky wink.

Time would only tell if the infamous club heed the knocks of the incoming trio...

The taste of skin, sweat and spit intermingled on Ashley's tongue, sparking her sensitive taste buds as she lay sandwiched between the sleeping figures of Cheyenne and Isabella, the former lightly snoring and the latter halfway through spooning the petite skater girl. She was the last to sleep out of the quartet of friends, the final girl to succumb to the calm embrace of a content slumber after the lengthy day of engorging herself on the tender flesh of her nubile playmates. It was no lie how much she enjoyed the club's activities, oftentimes being the first to dive her hungry tongue in between her friend's mouthwatering toes...but the truth of the matter was too much to ignore. The club was getting stale, everything was same old and the mere idea of scouting for new meat not only excited the teenager but frightened her as well.

It would only be until the morning after, that a very loud banging on the front door would address her worries.

BANG BANG BANG BANG

The sound of a fist against the front door snapped Ashley from the comfort of her sleeping bag and out from underneath the weight of Isabella, who'd somehow slumped on top of the skater girl over the course of the night. Kelsey was already awake, doing her morning yoga routine right next to the window, the headphones in her ears blocking out the disruptive noise.

With a sigh and a scrunch of her noise Ashley wriggled out of her sleeping bag and quickly padded her way out of the bedroom, wiping the sleep from her eyes as her dainty feet guided her to the front of Cheyenne's house. Combing a hand through her hair, the girl sucked in a deep breath before gingerly opening the front door to the peculiar trio standing with an eclectic look on their pretty faces. The one who knocked was smirking, the tall blonde looked bored and the gorgeous dark haired girl was looking off into the distance, her toes wriggling in their comfy looking sandals.

"Yeah? What's up?" Ashley exclaimed, leaning against the door frame as her eyes darted from each of her visitors feet before looking back at the smirking brunette. They were practically the same height with similar foot sizes, too bad the girl's were hidden in her flats.

"Told you there would be someone here!" The blue eyed brunette smiled, jabbing the tall blonde in the ribs before offering a hand out to Ashley. "I'm Amelia, this hoebag is Nicole and this cutiepie is Violet. We've come to...well, join your club." Amelia stated bluntly with a shrug of her shoulders, summoning a chuckle from the girl called Nicole.

"Oh...wow." Ashley murmured, momentarily stunned to see the trio of gorgeous girls actually seeking out the foot club. Clearing her throat and holding back a very, very chuffed smile Ashley stepped to the side before gesturing for the trio of friends to enter the house. "This was unexpected...really. I'm not sure I want to ask how you girls found this place but believe me...you couldn't have come at a better time. I'm Ashley by the way." She smiled, glancing down once more at Nicole's gorgeously pedicured toes as she racked her mind for something to say.

"So what's going to happen now? You need to haze us? Give us free jam and crackers? Inspect us for hidden microphones and cameras?" The gymnast smirked, playfully winking at Ashley as she delicately swayed in place.

Ashley paused, furrowing her brow for a moment.

"Well I guess we should...."

"You know...I guess now that you're here, and I don't know how much you guys know about this club...but I may as well perform an inspection. You know, just to get a feel for things." Ashley blushed, biting er lower lip as she glanced at the trio of feet that were on offer.

Amelia smirked cheekily, nudging Nicole in the side before raising her legs and resting her now bare feet atop the wooden coffee table, wiggling her adorable toes. Her flats lay dormant on the carpet and now the supple, dirty soles gleamed under the soft light of morning that filtered through the curtains. They were the first pair of feet that Ashley had ever seen that looked similar to her own, albeit they were smudged with dirt and a bit more thick with a sweet and sour aroma that tickled the skater girl's senses. Amelia was clearly finding the attention amusing and every time she caught the would-be club representative ogling her feet a giggle escaped her lips.

"Woah now, Amelia may have cute feet but let's be honest honey. Mine are the hottest of the bunch." The blonde clearly took a great deal of care with her feet and the aroma was almost pleasant, smelling like soap and new shoes, the very idea of running a tongue up and down those rosy tinted soles and sucking on those immaculately pedicured toes almost put Ashley in a daze.

Completing the trio of feet on offer were the dainty, french tipped feet of the dark haired beauty known as Violet, a simper painting her porcelain visage. Her feet glistened with a sheen of sweat, perhaps she was nervous or the walk to the house expelled her energy. The half Asian giggled, before raising one size 8 foot teasingly. "You like what you see?" She said in a soft voice, wriggling her glistening toes in front of her admirer's face.

Getting on her knees so her face was level with the feet resting on the coffee table, Ashley hungrily eyed up what was on offer before finally releasing a sigh and speaking.

"How about we start with...."

info.brief_description: A group of girls with a shared fetish for the feet of other girls go hunting for others.
info.description:
This is a story of of a close-knit group of girls who enjoy worshiping their own feet. However, they have now grown bored of playing with their feet, and have decided to venture out to seek out new girls for their club. Each girl is headed to a separate location to recruit.

Rules For Adding Content


* Girls only.
* Sexual content is allowed, but only if the story has progressed to that point reasonably.
* No "supernatural" elements.
* Add who you please, but include some description in addition to their name and foot size such as details of their shape/soles/toes/etc. It is ideal to put effort into providing meaty descriptions for the subject matter rather than be vague like many other stories.
* Include proper grammar, spelling, and layout. I don't mind a mistake or two, but a wall of text littered with errors will be deleted.
* 2000 characters minimum per chapter.
* Just for consistency, no colored text.
* No violence/death. Torture is also off-limits unless it is relegated to the tickling of feet, but don't focus on it.

Initial Club Members


Ashley - Skater girl with a pair of small size 6 feet with marshmallow toes and average width. Went to the Skate Park.

Isabella - Nerdy girl with a pair of smooth size 8 feet with short toes. Went to the Library.

Kelsey - Preppie girl with a pair of narrow size 9 feet with long toes. Went to the Mall.

Cheyenne - Athletic girl with a pair of large size 12 feet with big toes. Went to the Soccer Field
